World.headline: Spain: Over 20 killed after high-speed trains collide; videos show passengers crawling out of windows

key_points: Over 20 people died in a high-speed train collision in Spain.
Passengers were seen crawling out of windows for evacuation.
Investigations are underway to determine the cause of the accident.

Health.headline: Peanut lodged in the lung, oxygen at 40%: Two infants narrowly escape death in Faridabad

key_points: Two infants in Faridabad narrowly escaped death due to a lodged peanut in a lung.

Health.headline: Women with PCOS face up to sevenfold higher risk of type 2 diabetes: Doctor explains the link

This crucial information is vital for early detection, proactive management strategies, and better patient outcomes.
key_points: Women with PCOS face up to a sevenfold higher risk of type 2 diabetes.
